property.name: latitude
property.description: positive is north of equator; negative is south

property.name: longitude
property.description: positive is east of prime meridian; negative is west

property.name: altitude
property.description: positive is above the WGS 84 ellipsoid (empty value if no altitude is available)

property.name: position_covariance
property.description: defined relative to a tangential plane through the reported position. The components are East, North, and Up (ENU), in row-major order
